title: Sweet, crunchy piccalilli
ingredients: ['1 large cauliflower, broken into 1cm florets', '3 medium onions, 1cm dice', '3 large carrots, quartered lengthways then .5cm slices', '1 cucumber, peeled and de-seeded, 1 cm dice', '200g fine beans, sliced', '100g salt', '75g plain flour', '13g mild curry powder', '13g turmeric', '40g mustard powder', '26g ground ginger', '565g sugar', '1 litre white (distilled) malt vinegar']
